name: tv.demoapp.main.scene
description: This is a resource that contains all the attributes for the main scene in the demo app. This will contain information about the background colour or image, scene tltle, text colour and size.
title.label: Tizen Demo App

name: tv.demoapp.globals.scene
description: This is a resource that contains all the attributes for a scene in the demo app. This will contain information about the font, background colour, text colour and size

name: tv.demoapp.main.card
description: This is a resource that contains all the attributes for the main scene cards in the demo app. This will contain information about the background colour, image, card label, text colour and size.
label: Card Label

name: tv.demoapp.media.button1
description: This is a resource that contains all the attributes for the media buttons in the demo app. This will contain information about the colour or image, label, text colour and size.
label: Favourites

name: tv.demoapp.media.scene
description: This is a resource that contains all the attributes for the media scene in the demo app. This will contain information about the background colour or image, video, scene tltle, body, text colour and size.

title.label: Movie Trailer

name: tv.demoapp.msgcenter.scene
description: This is a resource that contains all the attributes for the message center scene in the demo app. This will contain information about the background colour or image, title, text colour and size.

name: tv.demoapp.media.button2
description: This is a resource that contains all the attributes for the media buttons in the demo app. This will contain information about the colour or image, label, text colour and size.

name: tv.demoapp.simpleEvent.button

name: tv.demoapp.purchase.button
